column5: Lakeside Retreat is a 2 story, 1500 square foot home overlooking the amazing cliffs and beautiful waters of Lake Whitney. It has 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and is just a few minutes drive away from a local fishing and swimming area. Lakeside Retreat is located on a quiet street with fantastic views of Lake Whitney and has a casual, nautical style interior. With ample space to accommodate up to 8 guests, the Lakeside Retreat is the perfect relaxation place for a wonderful lake vacation!
